reviews.review: 最近忙着练习护士，低段位的人基本都遇过我，屠夫段位上去我就玩个辣鸡屠夫掉分，想不到的是我18段护士也能遇到开挂的孤儿，跑步带闪现（网吧高配机子， 不可能是我房卡） ，其他三个人都好好的 就他闪现，我护士站山上一脸懵逼，感觉我瞬移都没他跑得快！结束后，他队友才告诉我，他是开挂的，服了。这游戏还开挂，你段位上去又能怎么样？有意思吗？我还玩掉位。

Dead by Daylight
Dieses Spiel macht auf jeden Fall Spaß, es ist eines meiner lieblingsspiele auf Steam und ich glaube das wird es auch erstmal bleiben!
Wirklich egal ob man es mit Freunden Spielt oder nicht, es ist immer aufregend und spannend!
Das einzige was ich in diesem Spiel hasse ist wenn einige Spieler unfair spielt, zum beispiel wenn ein Killer vor dem Haken campt... aber dafür können die Spielentwickler ja nichts!

Insgesamt:
trotzdem 9 von 10 Punkten!

Ich empfehle dieses Spiel auf jeden Fall weiter!

Glad to say that the matchmaking and netcode for disconnections has been greatly improved.  I'm happy to give my recommendation for this game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Earlier review:

The worst netcode I've ever put up with.
The game is pretty good, but the delays to find a match to play in are inexcusable for a game that has been released for so long.  If one of the survivors disconnects during match setup, you get to strap in for a solid 2 minute wait while the horrible netcode decides that the missing player is indeed missing. Frustrating everyone else who is waiting to start a game.

I'd love to recommend, but whoever is responsible for this game's matchmaking and particularly for its netcode - needs to be hung on a hook and left to die.
很棒但是老屠夫对新手不友好

这个游戏本身是非常不错的，但是，了解的人会知道，外服和国服玩起来体验完全不同。
并不是我歧视自己的同胞，大部分的人为了赢，滥用游戏机制，开外挂，利用bug，非常不和谐，严重影响别人游戏体验。
昨天刚玩了一天，一整天都有人开外挂或者屠夫故意限制网速让我不能正常的游戏，我非常愤怒！
结合h1z1事件，我终于明白外国为什么要封锁中国区了，游戏做得再好也是需要有良好的玩家氛围才能愉快地体验地。
真正热衷游戏的玩家换个游戏吧。

发布于：2017年1月21日下午1:35

SALVE SALVE

I'll start off by saying I love this game. It's really fun, and you remember your first matches. The gameplay is addicting... when you can actually play the game. I've tried to get my friends into this game, and it's damn near impossible when their very first view of the game is waiting 10~ minutes just to find a match, only to have the lobby fail. 

When the game works, it's great. Since the last update I've started having the game crash to desktop now too, on top of infinite loading screens. If I could get my friends into a lobby and actually PLAY the game I'd recommend it to everyone I know. 

I stopped showing it to people when it got too embarrassing waiting for the game to work after they bought it on my word though. If the issues are addressed, instead of a new content DLC, I'd change this review immediately but holy hell just FIX. MATCHMAKING.

EDIT June 2017: Nothing has changed. I get a guy to buy the game this week, we try four times to get into a lobby, two games fail to start. Tonight I sit searching for a lobby for fifteen minutes before dropping into one, then wait five minutes for the progress bar to load, only to drop me back at the main menu. There is simply no excuse for this, from a networking stance.

EDIT July 2021: Four years later and a lot has changed. The content has always been great, but now the matches, group play options, and custom matches load much quicker. I can now easily recommend the game and have a lot more friends playing.

For players like myself, who like to enjoy the game and not get way too competitive, it was a much enjoyable game. There are times that I may shout out BULLSHT, but you just got to deal with it. Every game has pros and cons, i'm not going to list any of my thoughts on those. There are plenty of other reviews that you can look at for that.

Overall, I enjoy the game for what it is. I have been playing it consistently for awhile and still find myself going to it for some fun.

It's not worth it... You can't play with your friends... If you want to play with one more person, there's a little chance that the game finds a killer... But if you would like to play with more than 1 friends, you will wait like 30 mins to find a killer, which will instantly leave... Than you will get back to searching for games, which means you'll wait another 30 mins...  This means there isn't any priority...
From 38 hours in this game, I played like 15 maybe or less... the other 23 was "Searching For Games"...
Worst matchmaking I've ever seen...
The patching... In january 2 patches came out in 2 weeks both were 200 MB... And what did they fix? One killer's clothes... 
In-game... The Host is the killer... so if his/her internet connection s**ks you will all lag as hell, and you will be unable to do the skill checks...

The game would be pretty good, if I could play normally with my friends, not just waiting for 3 hours for 2 games... :/

Игра просто замечательная, не считая того что:
1) Победить за манов против сурвов в пати, имеющих более 200 часов не возможно, т.к. они просто тебя загенрашат
2) Играть на любом мане кроме Нюрсы, Они или Мора ошибка, ведь если сурвы будут бегать от тебя хотя бы по 30 секунд, то этого хватит, чтобы завести 5 генов. Единственный вариант игры за НЕ мобильных манов - это кемп
3)За сурвов же играя не фул пати игра превращается в ад. Где чел с palastatiof fave не может снять тебя с крюка, т.к. не может найти кнопку. Ман пробивает тебя в палеты и окна, хотя не должен, но он проживая в своей Океании спокойно этим промышляет. 
4) Играя за сурвов фул пати вы не оставляете ману шансов на жизнь, если он не будет брать кемп бубу.
12/10 кемперящих буб

Très bon jeu, immersif et très attrayant. Seul bémol à mon goût un système de matchmaking qui laisse à désirer... Trop souvent des parties ne sont pas trouvé en survivants et il me faut relancer le jeu. Et la harpie est un peu op à mon avis, mais ça c'est personnel !^^

If you were a fan of L4D2, Evolve or any other asymmetrical game, youll probably like this.

[h1] Macht süchtig!! [/h1]

Ich habe mir das Spiel kurz nach dem Release zugelegt und seitdem einige Stunden damit verbracht.

Im Großen und Ganzen ist das Spiel sehr sehr gut und hat auch einiges an Suchtpotenzial.
Es bietet durch die verschiedenen Charaktere doch auch eine gewisse Abwechslung, die aber auch durch immer gleiche Taktiken schnell sehr lästig werden kann.
Seitdem man auch vernünftig mit seinen Kameraden zusammen spielen kann macht das Ganze auch noch ein wenig mehr her, da man als Team einfach stärker ist.

[b]ABER Leider[/b]
gibt es auch einige massive Negative Aspekte die man nicht unbeachtet lassen darf.

Wer das Spiel schon seit längeren sein eigen nennt, hat auch die ein oder anderen Nerfs schon miterlebt.
Einige davon waren sehr gut für die Balance des Spiels, andere sind aber auch genau in die Falsche Richtung abgedriftet.
Da durch jeden Patch oder jedes Update einiges geändert wird, ist das aber nicht mal das Größte Problem.

Vielmehr ist es zu einen Trend geworden das Spiel der anderen zu sabotieren und einen dadurch den Spaß am Spiel zu nehmen.
Zum einen ist die Mehrzahl an Killern, die sobald jemand am Haken hängt fröhlich vor sich hin Campen, drastisch gestiegen. Zum anderen gibt es aber auch Überlebende, die entweder kurz vor Matchbeginn die Lobby verlassen oder disconnecten sobald der Killer sie und nicht die anderen Mitspieler im Visier hat.


Momentan sehe ich dieses als das weitaus größere Problem an, da gerade die jenigen die vllt alleine spielen, so in kürzester Zeit das Interesse an dem Spiel verlieren bzw. kaputt gemacht wird..

Ich hoffe, dass durch das Einführen der Melde Funktion und bewerten jeder Runde bald Abhilfe geschaffen wird.

Aus meiner Sicht ist das Spiel trotz allem sehr empfehlenswert. Ob mit Freunden oder alleine ist es eine gute Methode in manchen Situationen seinen Adrenalinspiegel zu erhöhen :D

Рекомендую. Dead by daylight одна из из неногих игров такого жанра которая смогла меня зацепить. Это мая новая любимая игра. Эта игра отличается от серой массы ей подобных тем, что она может напугать. но ты не будешь сидеть в углу карты с грязными штанами.       +очень даже неплохой геймплэй. я ставлю dbd безусловный +!

Dead by daylight, игра которой нет аналогов, если угодно первая в совем роде. Да, хорроры в жанре survival это не редкость, однако геймплэй DbD уникален. Играть в нее интересно как за выживших, так и за маньяков. Режим игры с друзья подарит вам и вашим друзьям незабываемое время проведенное вместе! Я абсолютно точно рекомендую данную игру к покупке, не смотря на некоторые ее минусы (такие как баги, кемперы и т.п). Моя оценка для данной игры составляет 8/10 .
可玩性还是较高，对电脑硬件要求程度也很亲民

一款比较不错的游戏，可玩性还是很高的！

A good game which is absolutely ruined by two factors.

1. The game directly encourages people to play like trolls due to the points system. The objective of the game as a victim is not to escape - you only gain 5000 points for that. You can get more points if you get chased, rescue other survivors from hooks, drop pallets on the killer and THEN escape. This leads to victims teabagging the killer to force a chase, swarming around hooks to rescue people rather than fixing the generators, lurking around pallets instead of fleeing, etc. The hook swarming by victims encourages the killer to camp the hook, which leads to endless crybaby behaviour after the match from the victims, such as insults and false reporting.

2. The first point wouldn't be so bad if it weren't for the second. Trash talking and abusive behaviour is part of gamer culture, after all. The second (and biggest) problem about the game is the control freak developers. If you look in the forums, there are many threads that are locked. There are many users that are banned from posting. The anti-cheat system which is a mandatory part of this game results in many false positives but the developers would rather ban nine legitimate users instead of letting one cheater go. On their Twitter accounts (which aren't followed by the vast majority of players) they arbitrarily declare certain playstyles "cheating" and threaten to ban people over it, because they're not intelligent enough to make those playstyles unbeneficial or impossible through patches. Rather than acknowledging the issues and fixing them, the developers just prefer to add a report button so bedwetting victims can report a killer everytime they die.

By listening to the most negative, hostile voices and obeying their demands, the developers have essentially become the game's most salty survivors. This community isn't toxic, it's just a normal gamer community that sees abusing the report feature as a way to get a tactical advantage. The developers however are 100% raw sewage because they let the inmates run the asylum. They'll kill the game with their police state attitude. Allowing people to report other users for "griefing" is a licence to let them report for literally anything. They shouldn't take such reports seriously, but they do.

I won't use bots, I won't hack and I won't insult other users but I'll play this game however I want, regardless of the consequences. I suppose this will lead me to getting banned at some point, with a possible VAC ban on my record, even though I was playing the game unmodded and perfectly legitimately, all because I was facecamping or some other negligible tactic which annoyed developers with zero sense of a proportional response.
